channel.title: Pi activating double xp for 1 weekend?

item.title: Pi activating double xp for 1 weekend?
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

You have to edit your Config class.
Instead of: public static final double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;
Make it: ]public static double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;

Read full topic

@deans1243 wrote:

ty emulous ++ cause you have helped me alot. im gana pm you about my source i really need this fixed and it seems like something very difficult but ty for that link:)

[edit]
ugh i got this error and ive never had a error like this so idk realy how to fix it any help pleas?/

src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:220: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:224: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:227: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
